posts.author: Nokteronoth
posts.content:
Another build made just for giggles. I mean- Who expects a rogue to be that scary? For losing all but 3 of the Ranger levels(As Arelith requires at least 3), someone could pull 5 Ranger, 15 Barbarian, 10 Rogue, and get either Crippling Strike or Improved Evasion, for yucks. And who knows? You might get lucky.

Can use medium armor in combat, and sneak around in clothing. It's interesting to switch back right before striking, since it only takes a moment.

PvP mainly, level 1-30, should be decently easy to play and level up while low.
